description: Arc’teryx is rooted in climbing. So is the Konseal. Durable, versatile and made to move on the rock or in the gym, these will be your new favorite shorts – on or off belay. The rugged, comfortable fabric combines cotton’s natural softness and breathability, nylon’s quick-dry durability and elastane’s stretch. A gusseted crotch adds freedom of movement, the pull-on waistband fits comfortably under your harness, and there are five pockets – including a harness-accessible one at the thigh.
name: Arcteryx Konseal Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
